metadata.description:
we’re a lisbon born, london based alt-electronic duo. 

in 2020 we found ourselves unable to tour for the first time since we started playing together and we began taking interest in web 3 and all the possibilities it could lead to within the music industry. 

in the beginning of this year we were selected as one of five artists to be part of the LNRZ freshman class and work on music nfts alongside Reo Cragun, clear eyes, and the rest of the freshmen (Madalen Duke, Tate Tucker, Lackhoney and Mark Jonhs).

after doing a couple of releases with LNRZ we're happy to be releasing our first sound drop on our own.

"the balance i crave” is a mourning song about the loss of a special connection you once had with someone you grew up with.

lyrics.text:
i know i can’t keep up
i’m too close to my heart
i find warmth in the past

and i am the fruit of my bring up
nothing can be perfect
i’m deep in tradition

oh, you don’t understand,
oh, i tried but i failed again,
oh, it’s like losing a friend
oh, a winter with,
a winter with no end

far from what we were
far from what we wanted
watching the slow burn
losing all the confidence

its the balance i crave
its a fruit all mature
it’s the roots well grounded

its the balance i crave
its a fruit all mature
it’s the roots well grounded

take a steady hand
it’s a form of love for the unprepared

far from what we were
far from what we wanted
watching the slow burn
losing all the confidence

oh, you don’t understand

metadata.name: the balance i crave #1
metadata.title: the balance i crave
